src:
Edelmetalle
Der Goldpreis wird leicht 2020 steigen - sagen Goldexperten
Analysten und Edelmetall-Händlern rechnet mehrheitlich damit, dass Silber und Gold weiter gefragt bleiben dürfte.

02 Nov 2019, 18:00

Die Unze Gold sollte im laufenden Jahr auf einen Durchschnittspreis von 1'402 Dollar kommen – und nächstes Jahr auf 1'537 Dollar. Dies das Resultat einer Umfrage unter Gold-Analysten und Gold-Händlern (Mittelwerte). Zum Vergleich: Aktuell beträgt der Unzenpreis 1'514 Dollar.
Die Erhebung wurde von «Reuters» unter 40 Experten durchgeführt. Als die Nachrichtenagentur im Juli dieselbe Umfrage startete, erwarteten die Befragten noch einen Schnitt von 1'351 Dollar fürs laufende Jahr sowie von 1'433 im nächsten Jahr.
Danach kam es bekanntlich zu einem deutlichen Anstieg, ausgelöst durch diverse politische und wirtschaftliche Unsicherheiten, so dass die Feinunze im September so teuer war wie seit sechs Jahren nicht mehr: nämlich 1'557 Dollar.
Aufwärtsdruck dürfte bleiben
Die Händler und Analysten rechnen nun also mehrheitlich damit, dass der Aufwärtsdruck fürs gelbe Metall bestehen bleibt. «Zinssenkungen durch wichtige Zentralbanken, trübere weltwirtschaftliche Aussichten und schärfere geopolitische Spannungen sind die wichtigsten Antreiber für den Goldpreis», sagt Daniel Hynes, Roshstoffstratege bei der australischen Grossbank ANZ.
Und Frank Schallenberger, Rohstoffanalyst bei der LBBW, sagt: «Kaufen die Zentralbanken und ETF weiter und senkt die US-Notenbank Fed weiter ihre Zinsen, so reden wir in naher Zukunft von einem Goldpreis von 1'600 Dollar.»
Bei Silber erwarten die von «Reuters» Befragten einen Durchschnittspreis von 16,24 Dollar pro Unze (2019) respektive von 18,13 Dollar pro Unze (2020). Auch hier wurden die Erwartungen hochgeschraubt: Im Juli hatten die prognostizierten Werte noch 15,50 beziehungsweise 16,85 Dollar betragen.
Aktuell liegt der Unzen-Silberpreis bei 17,78 Dollar, im Jahresschnitt kostete ein 28-Gramm-Barren bislang 15,97 Dollar. Dies, nachdem dieses Metall im September ebenfalls nach oben driftete und erstmals seit 2016 über die Marke von 19 Dollar pro Unze kam.
(Reuters/rap)
text:
Rogue jealousy - carola rackete, who has undressed the clothes of the migrant-saving heroine to give herself ...

02 Nov 2019, 18:51


GELOSIA CANAGLIA - CAROLA RACKETE, WHO WAS COVERED THE SAVING-MIGRANT HERINAL CLOTHES TO GIVE ENVIRONMENTALISM, DISCHARGES THE GRILLS, PUNCHING THE RIVAL: "WE CANNOT LEAVE THE CHILDREN CERTAIN RESPONSIBILITIES. I HOPE THAT THE END WILL BE THE ADULTS TO ACTIVATE. FRIDAYS FOR FUTURE HAS A SINGLE LEADER. IN MOVEMENTS IT IS BETTER TO HAVE MORE THAN A REPRESENTATIVE "- AND THEN IT LAUNCHES IN PREDICAS TO SAVE THE PLANET THAT IT REMEDY BY MAKING A COPY AND PASTE FROM THE SWEDISH ACTIVITIES 'PROPOSALS ...


Gianluca Veneziani for "www.liberoquotidiano.it"




CAROLA RACKETE

Envy is a green eyed monster, even when dealing with green issues.
Carola Rackete knows it well, the champion of migrants who has just reconverted to the defense of the environment: as Salvini is no longer there, he must have realized that it is no longer worthwhile to have politics on the skin of immigrants but it gives more visibility to preach against global warming. Except that that place is already occupied, that battle is already carried out by someone else: a famous girl named Greta who is half the age of Carola but twice the success.




greta thunberg leonardo di caprio

And this must annoy the Sea Watch commander a little, and fuel that competition or jealousy between women who never misses an opportunity to surface.
And so, interviewed yesterday by Il Venerdì di Repubblica, Rackete brings out her critical point of view on the very young Swedish activist.




carola rackete

Yes, «he has great merits», he explains, but «we cannot leave children or teenagers with certain responsibilities. I hope that in the end it will be the adults who take action. And again: «Fridays for Future has only one leader, Greta. In movements it is better to have more than one representative ».
In one fell swoop, Carola gives Greta the little girl and the self-centered woman, one who claims to do everything by herself without being able to do it, while in the world "there are some amazing kids who are organizing protests, and nobody is talking about". Ah jealousy jealousy.




leonardo dicaprio and greta thunberg-1

EROINA SALVA-PROFUGHI It is evident that Carola also says this for personal interests, to be self-accredited since she herself is now building her profile as an activist on the role of witness of the environmental alarm. Thanks to his image of heroin, save-refugees are already traveling around the continent like a spinning top, giving lectures right and left, being invited to panels, official appointments, institutional venues.




CAROLA RACKETE

Now he intends to do the same as an environmentalist icon, promoting his book the day after tomorrow The world we want (Garzanti), almost an answer to Our house is in flames of Greta, and launching the same warning to "save the planet" that could to face a catastrophe around 2050 (a bit of originality, no, eh?).




greta thunberg 5

Even on the remedies to deal with the environmental drama, Carola's recipe is identical to that of Greta. Guess what? Stop taking planes. Only that the Rackete is even more drastic than the Thunberg, that is, it does not limit itself to making global appeals, to suggesting policies to the States and the powerful, but it claims to be able to interfere in personal freedom.




MEME ON CAROLA RACKETE

To be interviewed and to promote her book, for example, she forced the journalist on Friday to undertake a thirteen-forty-eight hour Rome-Vienna journey by train, so that she would not take the plane, which she considered too polluting. When we say respect the right to self-determination of others
And again, Carola demands that in the medium term all the planes be emptied, the routes are halved and the same airlines fail, realizing that that business is not "more convenient". To this end, starting to use the Noi as the Magician Otelma, Carola prophesies: "In the world that we want the planes will be used very little, and never to go on vacation.




greta thunberg 3

Today there are those who fly from Barcelona to London over the weekend just for shopping. This should never happen again ". So let Thai resorts that live on world tourism or luxury stores frequented by international customers go down the drain. Let free trade and free movement be buried, in the name of Carola's fanaticism
SIDE EFFECTS Here it is, the environmental totalitarianism that not only limits individual freedom but hopes for the failure of an entire system thanks to which millions of people live and work. It is the ideology that claims to assert itself regardless of human costs, considered negligible collateral effects, as in the worst dictatorships of the past. Too bad, however, there are two contradictions not just. Carola tries to prevent everyone from moving as they wish, but she allows a few (migrants) to move where they can't. Violating territorial waters and international standards.




MEME - CAROLA RACKETE LIKE THE ISOARDI IN ARM WITH SALVINI

And again: she is fiercely opposed to air travel, but she forgets that ship movements - of which she is the protagonist, being captain of a boat - are more polluting than those on rubber. However, we can see that the pollution of NGO ships is good and right and does not impact on the health of the planet.




greta thunberg 4

That the trafficking of human beings is the only form of mobility allowed for Carola?
